amendment.description: To remove a fiscal year limitation from an authorization of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4088 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4088 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S12029; text: CR S12029) To remove a fiscal year limitation from an authorization of appropriations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4088 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4088 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
